== Bug Hug Day, 2007-12-05 ==

This is a day where we all make a concerted effort to help triage and identify duplicate bugs in Ubuntu (see the <nowiki>[[UbuntuBugDay|official Bug Day]]</nowiki> page).  The Michigan LoCo even has a <nowiki>[[MichiganTeam/BugTeam|Bug Team]]</nowiki> which will help us to organize local users.

== Resources ==

The UbuntuBugDay page has a lot of resources specifically for this day.

Here is a quick list of bug-related resources: 

=== Bug Squad Knowledge Base ===

* The <nowiki>[[BugSquad/KnowledgeBase|BugSquad Knowledge Base]]</nowiki> has general bug information, including how to:

** <nowiki>[[Bugs/HowToTriage|Triaging Basics]]</nowiki>

** <nowiki>[[Bugs/Responses|Respond to a Bug]]</nowiki>

** <nowiki>[[Bugs/Improving|Improve a bug report]]</nowiki>

** <nowiki>[[Bugs/Status|Manage Bug Status]]</nowiki>

** <nowiki>[[Bugs/Importance|Manage Bug Importance]]</nowiki>

** <nowiki>[[Bugs/Assignment|Assigning Bugs]]</nowiki>

** <nowiki>[[Bugs/MarkingDuplicate|Marking Bugs as Duplicates]]</nowiki>

=== Helpful Launchpad Searches ===
  
** <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bugs?field.searchtext=&orderby=-datecreated&search=Search&field.status%3Alist=New&field.assignee=&field.owner=&field.omit_dupes=on&field.has_patch=&field.has_no_package=on|New Bugs Without a Package]]</nowiki>

** <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bugs?field.searchtext=&orderby=-datecreated&search=Search&field.status%3Alist=New&field.importance%3Alist=Undecided&field.assignee=&field.bug_reporter=&field.omit_dupes=on&field.has_patch=&field.component%3Alist=1&field.component%3Alist=2&field.has_no_package=|New Bugs that Need Triaging]]</nowiki>

** <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bugs?field.searchtext=&orderby=-datecreated&search=Search&field.status%3Alist=NEW&field.status%3Alist=INCOMPLETE_WITH_RESPONSE&field.status%3Alist=CONFIRMED&field.status%3Alist=TRIAGED&field.status%3Alist=INPROGRESS&field.status%3Alist=FIXCOMMITTED&field.assignee=&field.bug_reporter=&field.omit_dupes=on&field.has_patch=&field.has_no_package=|All the Newest Bugs]]</nowiki>
